name: photoresist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that reacts to light, especially one that is used in the process of making electronic circuits (= closed systems through which an electric current can flow): Silicon chips are manufactured by shining light on silicon that has been coated with photoresist. The company supplies photoresists for printed circuit boards. They are hoping to form a technical partnership with a photoresist supplier.
More examplesFewer examplesWe use a dry chemical process to remove photoresist.The photoresist protects the material beneath it while the material on either side of it is etched away.
